title: Non Fiction Business Writing: How To Boost Your Sales & Marketing with Content Creation
description: How To Boost Your Sales & Marketing With Content CreationBest practices for writing projects & how to best craft compelling words that get the results you are looking for!If you are like us, small business owners who are trying to sell products and services, your days are filled with writing. From blog posts to books, sales pages to press releases, it feels like everything we touch requires words to make it work.With that in mind, we wrote this book to show you best practices for writing various projects and how to best craft compelling words that get the results you are looking for!Who is this book for? Small Business Owners & Entrepreneurs Coaches, Speakers & Trainers Champions & Advocates Enlightened Businesses & Socially Conscious Entrepreneurs Authors and Bloggers˃˃˃ Use Your Words To Change The WorldYour words can make a huge difference in people's lives. Whether you are blogging, writing articles or even crafting a brilliant sales page that leads to a product that will help them, every word you write matters to someone.
author: Tara Jacobsen
